janadipathithumani bharakara rajayak ho rajaye ithiri kalaya pawathwagena yama sandaha ratama piligath madyastha esema ugath rata gana aadarayak thibena deshapremi agamathiwarayek aawashyayi .ada pawathina deshapalana charitha walin ese ratata aadare ugath buddimath eewagema rata gana salasumak thibena ekama nayakaya champika ranawaka mahathaya .ohuta me rate janathawa paksha bedhayak nathiwa chandaya labadennata idiripathwune samajaye buddimath janathawa ohuge watinakama awaboda kala nisayi .esema mahinda rajayada ohuta parisara amathikama ,balashakthi amathikama da wikramasinha rajaya ohuta megapolis nam rata diyunu karana amathikamada labadunne da ohuge asamanya dakshatha salaka balaya.
